title: My parents don't like kpop. How can I get kpop merch? - Quora

response.answer_text: Do you have daily, weekly, or monthly allowance ? If yes then start saving those. If don’t, try work for a part time or help mom clean house chores. Try to find as many giveaways as you can, and go to concert even without tickets. Usually they give you a bunch of free merch like posters, banners, etc Join a fan club that offers money for your service could also help. I have not found any though, but i heard they exist. Fighting!
